bio: Galmir Tralan (Redguard Male): From the sun-kissed sands of Hammerfell, I, a Redguard, mastered the art of swordplay and tactics. My combat skills were tested in the deserts against rogue mages and bandits. Now, in Skyrim, I join the Dragonborn's quest, my blade swift and true.
name: Galmir Tralan
